arts.ttl: Benfica beat Estrela 3-2 in incident-packed encounter
arts.sum: Benfica moved back to within six points of city rivals Sporting after winning a five-goal thriller at Estrela da Amadora tonight. The Eagles looked set for a routine victory after poor defending from the hosts allowed the visitors to score two set-piece goals in the opening 10 minutes through captain Nicolás Otamendi and an Issiar Dramé own goal. Estrela hit back when right-back Diogo Travassos tried his luck from distance and a deflection off Otamendi took the ball beyond Trubin and into the corner of the net. Benfica almost immediately restored their two-goal lead, Vangelis Pavlidis hitting an unstoppable shot into the net from 20 yards out. Estrela refused to lie down and new signing Chico Banza capped an impressive debut when he rounded Trubin and rolled the ball into the net to make it 3-2 at the start of the second half. A nervous Bruno Lage was barking out instructions when he wasn’t looking at his watch, and Arthur Cabral, possibly playing his final game in a Benfica shirt, had to chance to ease the Benfica coach’s anxiety in the closing minutes but missed a penalty. It mattered not at the visitors saw out the game to register their first Primeira Liga win on the road since beating Nacional in Madeira in mid-December. Estrela 2-3 Benfica highlights Highlights to follow

arts.ttl: Benfica Emerge as Frontrunner for Roma’s Dahl
arts.sum: As Roma continue to shape its squad with recent arrivals like Devyne Rensch and potential defensive reinforcements, the club is also actively managing its outgoing transfers. The post Benfica Emerge as Frontrunner for Roma’s Dahl appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Man United star's move to Benfica is OFF despite him saying his farewells to team-mates - but there is still interest in defender's services elsewhere
arts.sum: SIMON JONES: A Manchester United defender's proposed move to Benfica is now off. An agreement couldn't be reached between United and Benfica regarding a loan fee and a buy option.

arts.ttl: Kieran Tierney alternative hands Celtic major transfer boost as Luis Palma breaks silence on loan exit
arts.sum: Manchester United full back Tyrell Malacia - who has been touted as a potential Hoops target - has reportedly seen a move to Benfica fall through

arts.ttl: Man United star says his farewells to team-mates as he looks set for Benfica move - with Marcus Rashford also nearing shock move to Aston Villa
arts.sum: SIMON JONES: A Manchester United defender has said his farewells to teammates at Carrington as he looks to join Benfica.
